article_title: BP pauses all Red Sea shipments after rebel attacks
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  following  the  7  October  attacks  by  Hamas  that  killed  1,200  people.

article_title: BP pauses all Red Sea shipments after rebel attacks
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  said  more  than  18,700  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  war.
